alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 1:11PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Yavapai and central Coconino Counties through 145 PM MST... At 109 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Ash Fork, or 33 miles north of Chino Valley, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Yavapai and central Coconino Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
